name: notify my iPhone
data: {	   "title": data.new_state.attributes.friendly_name,	   "message": message,	   "data": {	       "subtitle": data.new_state.attributes.event_object,	       "push": {	           "thread-id": "home-motion-" & topic,	           "sound": {	                "name": "default",	                "critical": is_critical,	                "volume": 1	           }	       },	       "url": "unifi-protect://",	       "image": "https://s3.amazonaws.com/" & Bucket & "/" & Key,	       "@todo:entity_id": camera_entity_id	    }	}

name: notify my iPhone
data: {	   "title": "v-core 3 print job status",	   "message": "Print job completed",	   "data": {	       "subtitle": payload.fullModel.print_stats.filename,	       "push": {	           "thread-id": "vcore3_job_status"	       },	       "@todo:image": "https://s3.amazonaws.com/" & "Bucket" & "/" & "Key",	       "@todo:entity_id": camera_entity_id	    }	}

name: crosses 50%
notify my iPhone
data: {	   "title": "v-core 3 print job status",	   "message": "Print job at " & $round(payload.fullModel.display_status.progress * 100) & "%",	   "data": {	       "subtitle": payload.fullModel.print_stats.filename,	       "push": {	           "thread-id": "vcore3_job_status"	       },	       "@todo:image": "https://s3.amazonaws.com/" & "Bucket" & "/" & "Key",	       "entity_id": "camera.v_core_3_enclosure"	    }	}

data: {	   "notification_id": "vcore3_job_status"	       ,	   "title": "v-core 3 print job status",	   "message": "Print job at " & $round(	       payload.fullModel.display_status.progress * 100	   ) & "%"	}
